token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

external_id.desc: Creator defined GUID for the file.

file.desc: Specify a file by providing its ID.

file_not_found.desc: Value passed for `file` or `external_id` was invalid

file_under_review.desc: File passed is tombstoned for DLP review

too_many_ids.desc: The request specified both an external_id and a file, only one may be specified
